BIOGRAPHY

I have started working in the embedded industry since my second year of college being attracted and fascinated by the automotive field. As time has passed, I have started to develop my passion for web technologies, deciding to do a 180 degree spin and become a Full Stack Web Developer.

Hella, Craiova

Embedded Software Developer

I have been an embedded software developer at Hella for almost 2 years. My main activities performed in the company include: implementing customer requirements and concepts, diagnosing and solving issues observed during the testing phase, analyse warnings raised by functional safety components and functionalities.
